### MANDATORY

- [] I have tested this PR locally
- [] I have read and implemented all of the ACs

## REMINDER FOR AUTHORS

- Please avoid `any`
- Add types for function parameters as well as return values
- Run build, lint and format:fix commands and resolve errors
- Either delete commented out code or add a comment why it is commented out and when it will be resolved
- Check if variables are named properly and unambiguously - avoid `data`, `value` etc.
- Avoid `let`
- Strive for less than 4 parameters in a function and less than 5 dependencies in a service
- Extract magic strings into constants
- Commit messages describe in enough detail what has been done
